#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
int number =-1, remainder = 0;
//while(number == -1)
//{
//printf("Enter an integer (-1 to stop): ");
scanf("%d",&number);
//if(number == -1)
//{
//remainder = number % 2;
//}
//if(remainder == 1)
//printf("%d is an even number.\n", number);
//else
//printf("%f is an odd number.\n", number);
//}
if(number%2!=0)
printf("%d is an odd number.",number);
    else
      printf("%d is an even number.",number);  
return 0;
}
